sentences.en: ...Gaudi's luxuriant stone tableau of the Nativity on the cathedral's east face.
sentences.cn: ...大教堂东墙壁上由高迪创作的关于基督降生的华丽石雕。

sentences.en: " Indeed, history is nothing more than a tableau of crimes and misfortunes. "
sentences.cn: 费译: 毫无疑问, 历史不过是由罪恶和灾难构成的静止舞台造型罢了.

sentences.en: But he see a horrible tableau. There's much baby to surround the town.
sentences.cn: 但他看见恐怖的场景. 有许多婴儿包围在镇的出口.

sentences.en: For a few seconds the incident played out in tableau on the opposite sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 几秒内,对面的人行道上上演了这一冲突.

sentences.en: History is nothing more than a tableau of crimes and misfortunes.
sentences.cn: 历史不过是由罪恶和灾难构成的静止舞台造型罢了.

sentences.en: In a tableau, she once represented " Poland Breaking Her Chains. "
sentences.cn: 但在一次舞台造型中, 她扮演 “ 挣脱了锁链的波兰 ”.

sentences.en: In photographic, there is division asas contact between the insidetableau and outside - tableau.
sentences.cn: 对摄影来说, 画内外有分割而又有联系.

sentences.en: Landmarks The Lincoln Memorial, Washington Monument and joggers a classic capital tableau.
sentences.cn: 林肯的纪念, 华盛顿纪念馆和慢跑者来自模范首都的生动场面.

sentences.en: The story inspired both an opera and musical tableau.
sentences.cn: 这个故事派生出了戏剧和音乐表演.

sentences.en: The tableau of this photograph is rather succinct. Among the oasis several fishers cast vast nets.
sentences.cn: 此作的画面简洁得很, 在一片“绿洲”中,几条渔舟撒下了大网.

sentences.en: They admired the tableau of the Nativity.
sentences.cn: 他们欣赏着耶稣降生的场景造型。

words.tran_cn: 画面；活人画；戏剧性局面；生动的场面（复数tableaux）

trans.tran_cn: 人构成的画面或场景，活人画（舞台上活人扮的静态画面），戏剧性的场面
